name: Diavolo's King Crimson
description:
WASD to move Diavolo 

P - Pose 

Q - Summon Stand 

M - Stand arrow 

King Crimson: 

E - #### Your Finished!  Barrage ( 3 s ) -hashtags because yes 

R - OWATTAAAA Punch ( 5 s ) 

T - Epitaph ( 2 s ) -The only time dummy will fight back 

Y - KERAI chop  -strong left from deepwoken be like 

Z - Time Skip -not much to say about this 

X - Hmm... Soda - U can't deny the man of his soda, he requires soda 

F - Erase Time -Erase time will be canceled if you use a move. 

G - Bruno Impale - Impale only took me 2 hours :skull: 

S - Doppio Transform 

King Crimson's Arms (Doppio): 

E - Italian barrage - lol 

R - Ground Pound 

T - Epitaph -Impales 

Y - Scalpel throw -haha existing assets go brrr 

P - Long Diavolo transform -kore wa shinerenda :) 

S -Short Diavolo transform -yba combo moment
